exceptions.tactic: apply binary_power_split with (a := a) (i := i) in H.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall i a : nat, {u : nat & {v : nat | a = u ⇡ v * power i r /\\ (forall k : nat, u ⇣ (k * power i r) = 0)}}" on hypothesis of type "a ≲ b * power i r".

original: intros. apply binary_power_split with (a := a) (i := i) in H. destruct H as [u [v [Hu [Hv]]]]. exists u. split. - rewrite Hu. symmetry. apply mult_comm. - apply nat_meet_mult_power2 with (q := r) in H0. rewrite Hu in H0. apply nat_join_mono with (a := u) (b := v) (u := b) (v := 1) in H0. + simpl in H0. rewrite mult_1_r in H0. auto. + apply le_n_S. apply le_0_n.
